8.Name: Traction
8.Desc: Pull targets within range towards a specific position

Name: Jiyan
Desc: Jiyan, leader of the Midnight Rangers, acts with swift and resolute righteousness. He possesses the formidable ability to conjure a powerful Qingloong from the winds, making him invincible on the battlefield.

CharaInfo.Info: Jiyan, leader of the Midnight Rangers, acts with swift and resolute righteousness. He possesses the formidable ability to conjure a powerful Qingloong from the winds, making him invincible on the battlefield.
CharaInfo.TalentDoc:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 2141-G]

Resonator Jiyan's Forte-Awakening was observed at Camp Overwatch located in Desorock Highland. This event was characterized by the accumulation of air currents around his body, forming a distinctive lance.

Jiyan bears a distinctive Tacet Mark situated atop his dorsal ridge. Post-Awakening observations found some growths that resemble Loong scale on his left jaw. No indications of progressive expansion have been detected.

Resonator Jiyan possesses the ability to manipulate wind energy, which he can channel into a <ano=Teal Dragon>"Qingloong"</ano> that aids him in battle. Additionally, he possesses exceptional perception and leadership skills, utilizing his connection to the winds to gather and analyze battlefield information with astonishing accuracy. Empirical testing has shown an impressive accuracy rate of 99.12% in evaluating dynamic situations.
Jiyan's Resonance Spectrum Pattern shows no resemblance to known samples. The cause of his Awakening remains unknown.

Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent Rabelle's Curve with a steep rise in its middle section. Resonator Jiyan is thereby classified as a Mutant Resonator.
CharaInfo.TalentCertification:
The waveform graph for Resonator Jiyan shows non-periodic rectangular pulse fluctuations, with sustained peak values during specific time intervals. These waveforms demonstrate rapid and substantial changes within a short temporal span. There are two distinct waveforms identified, each with exceptionally high peak values.

Resonant Criticality: Relatively high. Resonator Jiyan's frequency displays high stability with a low risk of Overclocking.

No history of Overclocking has been documented. Routine examinations and counseling are recommended.

Stories.Title: The Unyielding Will
Stories.Content:
Shortly after Jiyan's appointment as the Midnight Ranger's general, an unexpected Tacet Discord Outbreak occurred. It was during this battle that he suspected the Threnodian's resurrection.

As the weary soldiers recovered from a fierce battle on the frontline, they were greeted by an ominous sight: shadow ravens circling above and swarms of Tacet Discords charging towards their position at the Norfall Barrens and Desorock Highland pass. 

The outnumbered army knew that failure to defend this stronghold could spell doom for the entire Huanglong.

Even seasoned veterans had never faced a crisis as urgent as this one. Amidst the chaos, Jiyan alone remained composed.

"All of you. Prepare to fight."

"Absurd! If we lose now, it's truly over. We can still retreat and protect the city!"

"Choose now: stand with courage, seize our chance. Or run and face defeat. For centuries, the Midnight Rangers have held this pass without retreat. Or do you prefer to go down in history as cowards?"

The veterans left, their emotions ranging from disappointment to rage.

Jiyan's resolve remained unshaken. He carefully studied real-time images from monitoring devices and noticed a connection between the Tacet Discords and the shadow ravens above. Quickly summoning the other commanders in the military, Jiyan devised a plan and led their coordinated army to face the enemy head-on. With precision, they used Sound Emulators set in a narrow valley to emit the shadow raven's frequency. As he expected, the Tacet Discords were drawn towards the sound, allowing for their easy capture.

Meanwhile, the Midnight Rangers stationed at Norfall Barrens were instructed to join hands with their comrades in the Desorock Highland, and carry out a pincer attack on the Tacet Discords. In the midst of a sandstorm, Jiyan bravely fought off hordes of enemies, paving the way for his fellow soldiers with unmatched strength.

The Tacet mark on Jiyan's nape was flickering, a sign of Forte overexertion, but he pressed on. His Qingloong flew high in the sky like a proud banner of resolution, never once faltering to the ground.

Stories.Title: The Reason to Fight
Stories.Content:
Jiyan is the youngest general in the Midnight Rangers' history. He is the Qingloong that everyone looks up to, and the invincible warrior no enemy stood any chance against. However, at some point, Jiyan became haunted by a recurring nightmare.

In that dream, the city of Jinzhou was engulfed in flames and consumed by Tacet Discords. The monsters raged on, feeding on the frequencies of the dead. Chaotic sounds echoed throughout the city, creating a symphony of destruction.

On the flame-lit battlefield, a lone figure fought relentlessly with a lance in hand. Each swing tore through the air. One, two, three... Hundreds of thousands of Tacet Discords fell under his fierce and restless strikes.

Despite his best efforts, the man could not quell the endless swarm of Tacet Discords ravaging the land. Day after day, year after year, he fought in vain until he was the sole survivor on a desolate battlefield. The Tacet Discords transformed into his fallen comrades, encircling and closing in on him.

"That's a clueless kid! How can we trust him with our lives?"

"You said you would protect us... but why?"

"Jiyan, what on earth are you fighting for?"

Despite being known for his calm and decisive nature, few were aware of the nightmares that would sometimes jolt him awake, haunted by the voices of the dead.

As the general, it was Jiyan's duty to safeguard not only the borders, but also the entirety of his nation. Every move he made and every plan he enacted carried immense responsibility and consequence.

This is why he seems to be always frowning, thinking, and planning ahead. One day, perhaps, he will finally turn around and answer those questions from the dead.

He fights for the living, and for the deceased.

Stories.Title: Silent Caretaker
Stories.Content:
Strange things do happen in the Midnight Rangers' camps.

A soldier with knee injury received specialized pain relief patches from the medics each time the seasons changed, despite the fact that he never told anyone about it.

Another soldier, previously inattentive during training, learned a few days later that the Midnight Rangers' General Affairs Department has paid for his mother's surgery.

When the logistics department was short on funds, it received a budget increase notice for the next quarter before any budget request was officially made.

Regardless of the size or age of the problem, there is always someone present to provide timely solutions when they are needed most. Just as a gentle rain quenches parched soil, this person carefully orchestrates aid and ensures that no area went without assistance. 

"Team 3's captain obviously had difficulties using his left leg during the drill. I went through his operation records, and it seems to stem from his prolonged exposure to the swamp during one of the previous missions. Pass along this prescription to the medics. They'll know what to do."

"Transfer some money to this account in the name of the General Affairs Department. Debit my account for the funding."

"I remember there has been a 20% increase in the number of recruits this year. Verify this with the Logistics. If confirmed, adjust next quarter's budget accordingly."

This is Jiyan, whose ruthlessness is reserved for enemies, while his tenderness is shown to comrades.

Stories.Title: What’s Inside His Gourd?
Stories.Content:
When asked about his childhood, Jiyan recalls a plethora of memories: the smell of medicine, the bright lights of the operating room, the sound of medical equipment clashing, and the hallway where many goodbyes were exchanged.

Born into a medical family, Jiyan became his mother's assistant at the age of 10. He excelled at medical skills and was popular among patients, not only for his expertise, but also for his great ability to soothe their upsets and cater to their needs.

Despite his exceptional medical prowess, there were still some lives that Jiyan couldn't bring back from the jaws of death — the last patient he couldn't save was Beiwang, his friend and mentor, who was heavily injured by Tacet Discords. 

Beiwang was initially known to Jiyan as the latter's patient, among many other Midnight Rangers who had to visit a doctor after fighting the frequent Tacet Discord tides plaguing the land. 

Beiwang was impressed by Jiyan's intellect and intuition, leading him to share details of the Midnight Rangers' marches and provide military instruction. Conversely, Jiyan actively contributed his analytical skills to strategy discussions, despite never experiencing battle firsthand. His unique perspectives injected vitality into their conversations, invigorating Beiwang's perspectives with a fresh outlook.

Beiwang's passing ignited a transformative spark in Jiyan — his wistfulness, frustration, and regret turned into his strength to wield the lance on the battlefield. 

Jiyan began to realize that the Lament is such a deep-seated disease in the world's veins, not even the most sophisticated medical instrument or the most adept surgeon could remove it. This realization drove him to cure the world in another way — he took up arms and fought the Tacet Discords head on, with unwavering resolve.

Now, only the gourd-shaped pill case on his belt loop indicates that he was once a doctor. Speculations abound about the contents of the case, with some claiming he uses sugar pearls to comfort children and others saying he drinks from it after battles.

If someone asks Jiyan about it, he would answer frankly, "Just some common medicines, in case someone needs them."

Stories.Title: The Temporary Team
Stories.Content:
Amidst the lively Jinzhou Riverside Games, a group of young men stood together.

"Here's the thing. Our captain's got an urgent matter to attend to, so we're one man short for the race. If you don't join us, we might have to forfeit." 

"Please, please help us. We've been training so hard for the Gulpuff Relay. So please..."

"Yeah, please, Jiyan!" they chorused, their urgency palpable.

Standing at the center was a bright-eyed young man. Meeting their sincere gaze, he nodded in agreement. Therefore, a temporary team was formed.

The young man asked about each teammate's conditions and the relay order. Then, he decided to adjust the strategy and take on the anchor leg himself.

The Games, initially held to relieve the tension of Jinzhou people after their first triumph over the Tacet Discord Outbreaks, had evolved into a major event in Jinzhou, in which the Gulpuff Relay was one of the biggest highlights.

The whistle blew. The relay racers charged forward, skillfully evading obstacles as they piloted their Gulpuffs. Crowds of cheering audience lined the banks.

However, a mistake occurred during the baton exchange between the first and second runners, leading the temporary team to lag far behind.

"Oops, looks like this team's hit a little snag! As a temporary team, their teamwork might be a bit rusty. Pity for them!"

The commentator then shifted his attention to the top three contenders.

Amidst the cheers, the race reached its climax as the final runner of the temporary team swiftly closed the gap with their opponents, unnoticed by everyone.

"Oh man! Look at the temporary team! There was a hiccup earlier, but now the last runner is overtaking! There's a key curve ahead... Wha-what's happening? He's overtaking everyone on the curve! That's absolutely amazing!"

Undisturbed by the noise and excitement of the audience, he kept his eyes locked on the finish line. A single thought was driving him forward — faster, just a little faster. His heart pounded, drowning out the loud cheers.

As confetti descended with a loud bang, the cacophony of sounds once again poured into his ears.

They won!

"Who could've imagined this temporary team would break the record! Congratulations to the young lads!"

His teammates swarmed him in excitement, surrounding the young man. Raising the weighty trophy, they vowed to team up again for the next Games.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: I
Voices.Content: I have long been stationed in the borderlands, with little knowledge of entertainment or places of leisure. However, if you are looking for tactics against Tacet Discords or beautiful natural vistas, I can provide some suggestions.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: II
Voices.Content: While the borderlands cannot rival the city's clamor and glamor, they do possess their unique charm. Should you find time, I suggest you come and witness the full moon and twinkling stars that grace the tranquil night skies. Rest assured, your safety will not be a concern; I will be there with you.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: III
Voices.Content: The Midnight Rangers are a source of solace for many, while I see them as a scalpel, with the duty of eradicating maladies. Me? I am the hand that guides this scalpel, I suppose.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: IV
Voices.Content: Soldiers of the Midnight Rangers have entrusted their lives to me. Therefore, every time I wield the scalpel, I must do so with absolute precision so as not to betray their trust. One day, this scalpel will eradicate all Tacet Discords, and when that moment arrives, I hope you can witness it with me.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: V
Voices.Content: Flowers in the Knell Square are planted to honor the deceased. These flowers are of a unique variety, and they require significant attention. Here is a cultivation guide. If I fail to keep my promise of witnessing humanity's victory with you, please plant one of these flowers there for me.

Voices.Title: Jiyan’s Hobby
Voices.Content: Though I no longer practice medicine, I still discuss medical knowledge with my mother in my spare time. This gourd-shaped pill case is a gift from her the year I joined the Midnight Rangers.

Voices.Title: Jiyan’s Trouble
Voices.Content: In just a few days, a thin layer of dust has collected on my desk. Cleaning is not a challenge, but consistency is.

Voices.Title: Favorite Food
Voices.Content: Jinzhou Stew is renowned for its wide variety of ingredients and easy preparation, making it a beloved homemade dish in Jinzhou. Having been stationed in the borderlands for most of my time, I sometimes miss that taste.

Voices.Title: Disliked Food
Voices.Content: In Jinzhou, there is a vegetable known as "Bittberry". It possesses a bitter and slightly astringent flavor, and is renowned for its detoxifying properties. When I was young, my mother was somehow convinced "those who can endure bitterness will rise above others." She frequently incorporated this vegetable into our meals. I must confess that its taste was far from pleasant. However, now serving in the army, I have grown accustomed to its flavor. After all, resources are scarce, and it is crucial not to squander them.

Voices.Title: Ideals
Voices.Content: If one day, the borderlands no longer need a general, I suppose my wish will have come true.

Voices.Title: Chat: I
Voices.Content: This spear was modeled after the weapon of Captain Beiwang, bearing the significance of quelling chaos and warding off external threats.

Voices.Title: Chat: II
Voices.Content: My family has been in the medical profession for generations. I once aspired to follow in their footsteps, saving lives and providing care. However, I soon realized that a doctor could never fully alleviate the pain caused by the Tacet Discords. It was this realization that led me to join the Midnight Rangers. Over the years, I have found my way of bringing solace to the world.

Voices.Title: About Mortefi
Voices.Content: Others often perceive Mortefi as arrogant and unapproachable, but, in fact, he is not that hard to talk to. Remember to be direct with him, as trying to be overly polite and subtle may only lead to misunderstandings.

Voices.Title: About Jinhsi
Voices.Content: The "battle" Magistrate Jinhsi has been taking on may prove more complicated than our situation in the borderlands: stipulating rules, overseeing trade, ensuring the well-being of the people, and managing the city's functioning all demand her coordination and judgement. Every time I return to Jinzhou, I can feel the city's vibrancy and enthusiasm, all thanks to her meticulous governance.

Voices.Title: About Taoqi
Voices.Content: Taoqi... Though our views on loose management don't always align, I am able to focus on the front lines without any worries, thanks to her effective leadership in maintaining Jinzhou's fortifications.

Voices.Title: About Yangyang
Voices.Content: She can perceive minute changes in the surroundings from the Streams, but there is a limit to the amount of information a single person can take in. Excessive use of this ability might add to her burden, and I hope she won't strain herself.

Voices.Title: About Baizhi
Voices.Content: Many stumble through life directionless, without ever finding a purpose. Baizhi is among the rare few who have found their calling, and she is willing to give up anything for the truth she pursues.

Voices.Title: About Chixia
Voices.Content: That energetic and passionate Patroller? Yes, I have heard of her. She has been devoting her time to protecting the dreams of children in Jinzhou.

Voices.Title: About Aalto
Voices.Content: Fog can be an enemy to soldiers on the march, as it limits visibility and complicates situational awareness. However, deploying fog strategically can be an effective move on the battlefield. I have had the opportunity to work with Aalto before, and he is an interesting person indeed.

Voices.Title: About Encore
Voices.Content: Are you referring to the little girl who is always seen by Aalto's side? I have met her once. She and Aalto complement each other perfectly, personality wise.

Voices.Title: Birthday Wishes
Voices.Content: I have worn this vambrace since my first battle. It saved my life countless times. A vambrace like this is believed to bring good luck, ensuring the safe return of soldiers. Though it may show signs of wear, I wish to pass on this luck to you. Additionally, I have prepared a few travel essentials that I hope will prove useful. Happy birthday.

Voices.Title: Idle: I
Voices.Content: Victory will be ours.

Voices.Title: Idle: II
Voices.Content: ... (a soft sigh)

Voices.Title: Idle: III
Voices.Content: *Effort Sound*

Voices.Title: Self-Introduction
Voices.Content: Jiyan, of the Midnight Rangers. Protecting our lands and people is my solemn duty. Should you encounter any difficulties here, I will do my utmost to help.

Voices.Title: Greeting
Voices.Content: I have never regretted braving the long night.

Voices.Title: Join Team: I
Voices.Content: Should you find yourself lost, follow the banner of the Qingloong.

Voices.Title: Join Team: II
Voices.Content: When danger arises, take cover behind me.

Voices.Title: Join Team: III
Voices.Content: The battlefield is dynamic. Do not let your guard down.

Voices.Title: Ascension: I
Voices.Content: I can sense an improvement in my strength. I suppose you are well-versed in the art of training, too?

Voices.Title: Ascension: II
Voices.Content: So you have opted for a prudent strategy this time. Next time, maybe we can consider something more unconventional.

Voices.Title: Ascension: III
Voices.Content: Remarkable strategy. Your insight provides me with unique and refreshing perspectives that I have not considered before.

Voices.Title: Ascension: IV
Voices.Content: With your bold plan, my Qingloong has gained more momentum on the battlefield. I appreciate your assistance.

Voices.Title: Ascension: V
Voices.Content: Commanding an army is not a simple task, and sometimes I find myself questioning my own decisions. Going forward, with you staying by my side, I should feel more at ease.

Voices.Title: Resonance Skill: I
Voices.Content: Finale!

Voices.Title: Resonance Skill: II
Voices.Content: Break!

Voices.Title: Resonance Skill: III
Voices.Content: Settled!

Voices.Title: Resonance Liberation: I
Voices.Content: Windrider!

Voices.Title: Resonance Liberation: II
Voices.Content: Fear no more!

Voices.Title: Resonance Liberation: III
Voices.Content: Unstoppable!

Voices.Title: Hit: I
Voices.Content: Retreat to advance.

Voices.Title: Hit: II
Voices.Content: Bide the time.

Voices.Title: Hit: III
Voices.Content: Time to fight back.

Voices.Title: Injured: I
Voices.Content: Don't you worry.

Voices.Title: Injured: II
Voices.Content: I can take it.

Voices.Title: Injured: III
Voices.Content: Till my last breath...

Voices.Title: Fallen: I
Voices.Content: A momentary setback...

Voices.Title: Fallen: II
Voices.Content: Time for a short break...

Voices.Title: Fallen: III
Voices.Content: Prevail... the lasting night...

Voices.Title: Echo Summon
Voices.Content: Lend me your power.

Voices.Title: Echo Transform
Voices.Content: Tell truth from facade.

Voices.Title: Intro & Outro Skills: I
Voices.Content: You're wide open.

Voices.Title: Intro & Outro Skills: II
Voices.Content: Ready for battle.

Voices.Title: Enemies Near
Voices.Content: Stay sharp.

Voices.Title: Glider
Voices.Content: A good vantage point.

Voices.Title: Grapple
Voices.Content: *Effort Sound*

Voices.Title: Sensor
Voices.Content: Approach with tact.

Voices.Title: Dash
Voices.Content: *Effort Sound*

Voices.Title: Wall Dash
Voices.Content: *Effort Sound*

Voices.Title: Supply Chest: I
Voices.Content: Extra supplies.

Voices.Title: Supply Chest: II
Voices.Content: For emergencies.

Voices.Title: Supply Chest: III
Voices.Content: Wouldn't hurt to be more prepared.

Goods.Title: The Art of War
Goods.Content:
"A general is a man of wisdom, faith, benevolence, courage and discipline." 
Jiyan's desk is always organized with books on warfare and notes reflecting his own strategies.

Goods.Title: Medicine Box
Goods.Content: Jiyan's enlistment in the army came with a gift from his mother - a medicine box shaped like a Terminal. She feared he would become a killer on the battlefield and reminded him of his role as a healer. He later used it to carry necessary medicines, just in case.

Goods.Title: A Corner of Jinzhou
Goods.Content: On an ordinary, everyday afternoon in Jinzhou, the sun was shining through the clear sky and spreading to thousands of homes, and Jiyan can't help but take pictures of the scene. The soldiers' sacrifices hold even greater significance against this tranquil backdrop.

SpecialCook.Name: Yesterday in Jinzhou
SpecialCook.Desc: Increases all teammates' ATK by 10% and Crit. Rate by 8%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.

Skill.Name: Lone Lance
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume Stamina to thrust forward, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack: Windborne Strike</color></size>
Hold <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> during <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Windborne Strike</color> after <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> ends, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack: Abyssal Slash</color></size>
Release <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> during <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Abyssal Slash</color> after <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> ends, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-Air Attack</color></size>
Consume Stamina to perform a Plunging Attack while in mid-air, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
After performing the <color=Highlight>Plunging Attack</color>, use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to perform a follow-up attack, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-Air Attack: Banner of Triumph</color></size>
After casting Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Windborne Strike</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color> in mid-air, Jiyan can perform a mid-air attack, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Windqueller
Skill.Desc:
Dash forward a certain distance, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
Can be cast in the air.

Skill.Name: Emerald Storm - Prelude
Skill.Desc:
After releasing Emerald Storm - Prelude, Jiyan enters <color=Highlight>Qingloong Mode</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Qingloong Mode</color></size>
Jiyan has increased resistance to interruption.
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> and <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> are replaced with Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Lance of Qingloong</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack: Lance of Qingloong</color></size>
Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.

Skill.Name: Heavenly Balance
Skill.Desc: After casting the Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Tactical Strike</color>, Jiyan's ATK is increased by {0} for {1}s.

Skill.Name: Tempest Taming
Skill.Desc: When Jiyan's attacks hit a target, Jiyan's Crit. DMG is increased by {0} for {1}s.

Skill.Name: Tactical Strike
Skill.Desc: Jiyan pierces the target in mid-air, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Qingloong at War
Skill.Desc:
When casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color>, if Jiyan has {0} or more "Resolve", he consumes {1} "Resolve" to increase the DMG of this Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color> by {2}.
When Jiyan is in <color=Highlight>Qingloong Mode</color>, DMG of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color> is increased by {3} and no longer consumes "Resolve".
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Liberation: Emerald Storm - Finale</color></size>
When casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm - Prelude</color>, if Jiyan has {4} "Resolve" or more, he will consume {5} "Resolve" to cast Emerald Storm - Finale, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG.
Emerald Storm: Finale can be cast in mid-air at low altitude.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resolve</color></size>
Jiyan can hold up to {6} Resolve.
Jiyan gains "Resolve" when his Normal Attack <color=Highlight>Lone Lance</color> hits the target.
Jiyan gains "Resolve" when the Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Tactical Strike</color> hits the target.
"Resolve" will gradually decrease if Jiyan does not hit a target within {7}s.

Skill.Name: Discipline
Skill.Desc: When the incoming Resonator's Heavy Attack hits a target, Jiyan will summon a lance to launch a coordinated attack, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> equal to {0} of Jiyan's ATK. This attack lasts for {1}s and can be triggered once every {2}s, up to 2 times.

1.Name: Benevolence
1.Desc:
Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color> can be used 1 more time.
When casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color>, the "Resolve" cost is decreased by {1}.

2.Name: Versatility
2.Desc: After casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Tactical Strike</color>, Jiyan gains {0} "Resolve" and his ATK is increased by {1} for {2}s. This can be triggered once every {3}s.

3.Name: Spectation
3.Desc: When casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color>, Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm: Prelude</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm: Finale</color> or Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Tactical Strike</color>, Jiyan's Crit. Rate is increased by {0} and Crit. DMG is increased by {1} for {2}s.

4.Name: Prudence
4.Desc: When casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm: Prelude</color> or Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm: Finale</color>, the Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all team members is increased by {0} for {1}s.

5.Name: Resolution
5.Desc:
Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Discipline</color> gains an additional DMG Multiplier of {0}. 
When Jiyan's attacks hit a target, his ATK is increased by {1} for {2}s, stacking up to {3} times; this effect is immediately maxed after he casts Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Tactical Strike</color>.

6.Name: Fortitude
6.Desc:
Every time <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color>, Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Tactical Strike</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Windqueller</color> is used, Jiyan gains {0} stack(s) of "Momentum", stacking up to {1} times.
Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm: Finale</color> will consume all "Momentum", and each stack consumed increases the DMG multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Emerald Storm: Finale</color> by {2}.
